The most up to date and comprehensive source of documentation on our framework and model is available at https://www.ready4-dev.com . Development versions of all code repositories referenced in this article are available in https://github.com/ready4-dev/ . Archived code releases are available in https://zenodo.org/communities/ready4  . All data repositories referenced in this article are available in https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataverse/ready4 .
